issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description: In the produced APK we have 3 times libkroll-V8 (armeabi, armeabi-v7a, x86) (+- 6Mo). When publishing on Google Play we should be able to publish one package by arch, effectively splitting by 3 the size of the app

comments.body:
Is there any word on when this will be fixed?

Is there a current work-around for creating separate APKs for different architectures?

Edit: Actually, I think this is done already, by TIMOB-7474
